summary: An ancient Danish story of evil, power and human spirit, that subsequently inspired William Shakespeare on his tragedy - Hamlet.
cast: Gabriel Byrne|Helen Mirren|Christian Bale|Brian Cox|Steven Waddington|Kate Beckinsale|Tony Haygarth|Freddie Jones|Tom Wilkinson|Saskia Wickham|Brian Glover|Mark Williams|Andy Serkis|Philip Rham|Ewen Bremner|Richard Dempsey|David Bateson|Jess Ingerslev|Ian Burns|Asta Esper Hagen Andersen|Henry Jessen|Birgit Thøt Jensen|Lisbeth Holt Jørgensen|Cecilie Brask|Trine Larsen|Kika Mazanti Sørensen|Oliver Fox|Ken Molnar
keywords: regicide|voice over narration|vengeance|uncle nephew relationship|stepfather stepson relationship
title: La verdadera historia de Hamlet, príncipe de Dinamarca
